p: Compound 241 was tested for antibacterial activity against Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 6633), Staphylococcus aureus (CGMCC 1.2465), Streptococcus pneumoniae (CGMCC 1.1692), Escherichia coli (CGMCC 1.2340), the results showed that 241 displayed modest antibacterial activity against B. subtilis with MIC value of 66.7 µM (the positive control gentamycin showed MIC value of 1.3 µM) [ 78].
